content: Fan Chen Fan Chen Assistant Professor Intelligent Systems Engineering School of Informatics and Computing Indiana University Bloomington Other Affiliations QSEc: IU-Quantum Science and Engineering Center LAIC: Luddy Artificial Intelligence Center Email: fc7@iu.edu Tel: (812) 855-0446 Office: MESH 113B 2425 N Milo B Sampson Ln Bloomington IN 47408 Google Map Faculty Profile Google Scholar LinkedIn dblp Biography Fan Chen is an assistant professor in the department of Intelligent Systems Engineering at the Indiana University Bloomington, and is affiliated with IU-Quantum Science and Engineering Center (QSEc) and Luddy Artificial Intelligence Center (LAIC). Dr. Chen received her Ph.D. from the department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at Duke University, her M.S. and B.S. from Tsinghua University and Xi’an Jiaotong University, China, respectively. Her research interests include Quantum Computing, Quantum Security, Environmentally Sustainable Computing, and Hardware Acceleration for Emerging Applications. Dr. Chen is the General Chair of IGSC 2025, the Technical Program Chair of GLSVLSI 2025, IGSC 2024, Posters Track Chair of QCE 2025/2024, Special Session Chair of ISVLSI 2024, chair of SIGDA University Booth at DAC 2022/2021, the Publication Chair of ISLPED 2022/2021, Web and Registration Chair of GLSVLSI 2022, Proceedings Chair of ASAP 2021, Arrangement Chair of GLSVLSI 2021. Dr. Chen is the Technical Program Committee members of over 20 international conference series. Dr. Chen served on the editorial board of IEEE Circuits and Systems Magazine (CAS-M) (2021-2023). She also serves as technical reviewers for over 30+ international conferences/journals, such as IEEE TC, IEEE TCAS-I, IEEE TNNLS, IEEE D&T, IEEE IoT-J, ACM TACO, ACM TODAES, ACM JETC, etc. Dr. Chen is a recipient of the 2024-25 Indiana University Bloomington Outstanding Junior Faculty Award, the 2022 NSF Faculty Early Career Development Program (CAREER) Award, the 2019 Cadence Women in Technology Scholarship. Her research has won the Best Paper Finalists at 2024 Design Automation Conference (DAC), the Best Paper Award (3rd Place) at 2023 IEEE International Conference on Quantum Computing and Engineering (QCE), the Best Paper Award and the Ph.D. forum Best Poster Award at 2018 Asia and South Pacific Design Automation Conference (ASP-DAC). Dr. Chen's contributions to the research community has been acknowledged by the 2024 ACM SIGDA Meritorious Service Award, the 2022 IEEE Best Associate Editor of the Circuits and Systems Society (CASS), and the 2021 Service Recognition Award of Great Lakes Symposium on VLSI (GLSVLSI).
